title: New tool gives deeper understanding of glioblastoma

title_detail.value: New tool gives deeper understanding of glioblastoma

summary: Researchers have developed a new tool to study genetic 'switches' active in glioblastoma tumors that drive growth of the cancer. In a new article, they identified key switches in different types of tumors, including switches linked to how long a patient survives.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have developed a new tool to study genetic 'switches' active in glioblastoma tumors that drive growth of the cancer. In a new article, they identified key switches in different types of tumors, including switches linked to how long a patient survives.
